RUN apt-get -qq -y update \
    && apt-get -qq --no-install-recommends -y install python3-pil \
    tesseract-ocr libtesseract-dev libleptonica-dev pkg-config tesseract-ocr-eng \

COPY . /memorious

WORKDIR /memorious

    MEMORIOUS_INCREMENTAL=true
